mcq.statement: Which dam is the largest earth-filled dam in the world and is located on the Indus River in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa?
mcq.one_liner: Tarbela Dam is recognized as the **largest earth-filled dam in the world**, situated on the Indus River in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.

suggestions.topic: Barrages of Pakistan on Indus River
